storyInfo: In the underground passage leading to the Mausoleum of Kings, certain memories find their way to Siege.

attributes.content: We're here. This path... connects the palace and the ducal manor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Whispers) ...Golden mane.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What did you just say, Vina?
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: No, it's nothing. It's been a long time since I saw them.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Not long ago, we left this place. Today, we walk these ancient bricks again. This path has likely never been trodden this frequently.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It was only meant for emergencies.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Too bad. Be it the ducal manor or the palace, it has never really served anyone in their time of need.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Mercenary, if you don't want to buy everyone here a drink, you'd better not joke about that.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Right then.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: Allerdale, you said I once came back through this passage with the Sighs of Kings...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I really don't remember that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This has me very restless. It's as though I am purposefully avoiding a great responsibility.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, it's okay. You were too young then.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Anyone who tried to force any kind of responsibility onto a child that had only just learnt to speak would have to be extraordinarily selfish. No mistake about it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Apologies. I might have insulted someone close to you.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Hm, actually, I rather agree with what you said.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But now, we've come back nonetheless.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: 'Responsibility'? 'Miracles'? I have no idea what they expected of me, nor do I really care.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But I stand here today, and I have something I must accomplish.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I shan't take on any titles because of it. I'm doing this... so that the people will know peace again.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah... We are approaching our objective, then.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Sirs, please tear down the brick wall blocking the path up ahead. Be quiet. Don't let them find us.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We need to go down from here...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Right, I...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.text: As I walk through the darkness, I hear footsteps from behind me.

attributes.content: What's the matter, Vina?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Never mind. Let's keep going.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No one on our tail.
attributes.name: Totter

attributes.content: The Sarkaz couldn't have figured we would go down.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: They must be throwing quite the party above us.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: It's possible that our allies are sacrificing their lives in this intense battle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I was actually apprehensive when Allerdale proposed this plan.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I should be standing with the Corps fighters... and the Rhodes Islanders.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Doctor's plan is meant to ensure our operation remains undetected.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No matter what happens aboveground, we must get our hands on the Sighs of Kings.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It is the key to foiling the Sarkaz's plans and can even turn the tide of the war.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This sword... I've only heard of it in the stories.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It was the sword of the Aslan forefathers.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: As the legend goes, it was forged for the Aslans by the fairy of the grasslands. A pasha of yore once beheaded the Poltergeist King with it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then, the Aslans came to Victoria to rule, and it became the symbol of their reign.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: According to some historical records, in the days before the nomadic cities came to be, the kings once cleaved Catastrophes with it.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: For centuries, there was not a single storm to threaten Londinium.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The masses believed that as long as the Sighs of Kings remains, Londinium would overcome all her foes forever, be they powerful poltergeists or terrifying Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You can't really believe...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I... I believe in Vina.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It's like you're trying to change the subject. Of course I believe in Vina too, but you can tell right away it's just a fairy tale. That's not real...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That is in fact not a fabrication to legitimize the Aslans' reign. It really can cleave Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: If The Shard, with its ability to pull in storms, is Victoria's spear against the outside world, then the Sighs of Kings, capable of rending Catastrophes asunder, is its strongest shield.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The spear is known far and wide, yet the shield exists almost only in legend.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But if we are able to wield this power, we will almost certainly be able to stop the Sarkaz's ambitions.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Allerdale, you're very familiar with our Realmblade.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I... I'm only fulfilling my responsibilities as a member of House Cumberland.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Have you seen the blade with your own eyes?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes, but only once.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What I saw... was something that could only happen in a dream.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What did the blade look like?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: It... It was beautiful.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It has the power to liven one's heart. The moment you lay your eyes upon it, you'll believe from the pit of your soul that you can triumph over anything.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: A bit over the top, innit?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Legends... Legends...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Maybe that's about the Sarkaz? Is that sword especially good at cutting Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Is cutting all you think about?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: If Vina had beaten that Sanguinarch bloody with her hammer the other day, it'd have a story like that in two hundred years.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Haha, that just might happen.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then Rhodes Island will become the fairy that bestowed the hammer.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Closure'll probably be happy about that.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: 'The Ark of God in the barrenlands! The return of the king!'
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: How's that a story? It's all real!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: In twenty years, the story of the 'Great King Vina, leading the Londiniers to chase out the King of Sarkaz' is bound to become a favorite story of all the kids that run around in front of our houses!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Then I've got to spend some time thinking how to better tell Vina's story... Hm...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: This isn't my story.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The bold, fearless Hannah 'Indra' Jackson, the witty Kate Morrigan, and the loyal, tenacious Isabelle Montague.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Also... the noble, upright Allerdale Cumberland.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is your story.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Let's keep going.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The story isn't going to write itself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Kyngasycath, the Sighs of Kings.
In her heart, Siege thinks to herself that she must have seen it before.
They are only vague fragments of memories and unclear voices.
My daughter, come. Take this sword.
attributes.name: Impassioned Voice

attributes.content: Is it calling to you?
attributes.name: Impassioned Voice

attributes.content: Feel it.
attributes.name: Impassioned Voice

attributes.content: Feel this voice...
attributes.name: Impassioned Voice

attributes.content: Feel Victoria.
attributes.name: Impassioned Voice

attributes.content: The palace is burning.
She wants to climb up and see what kind of show they are putting on outside. Things are always very lively on the king's birthday.
But all she sees is fire. The fire rages. There are also many men in uniform, either fleeing in all directions away from the flames or lying lifelessly on the ground.

The earth trembles. She's suddenly worried about the glass fowlbeast by her bed. It's a gift that she has just received. Lately, she hasn't been able to sleep without hugging that delicate little trinket.
Her Royal Highness Alexandrina!
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Don't go back! It's dangerous! Thank goodness you ran outside! You're their only objective, aside from His Majesty...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: His Majesty... His Majesty has...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: No, you needn't know this.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: He left us with one final order. To get you away.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Vina, what's wrong? You've been rather out of it since we came underground.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I... I remembered something. Something that I thought I'd forgotten long ago.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The kind that hurts to remember, or the kind that brings you joy?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's just... a voice.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Highness... you must walk the rest of the way on your own.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: You were here not too long ago. You remember, don't you?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: They're coming for us.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: No matter what happens, you must keep running down this passage.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Do not turn back.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.text: She listens to the officer and keeps running.
The path ahead is pitch-black, but she is more afraid of the star-like glow chasing her from behind.

She runs and runs for a long, long time. She's forgotten where she started and where she is going. She's almost cried all the tears she has, and the path before her is so long that she can't see its end.
She runs and runs, and a huge, golden mane appears beneath her.
She holds tight to the warm, golden color, and it feels as though she too has become a wild beast dashing on all fours.
At last, she no longer fears the nightmare that chases her. She cries for the things she has lost no more. Instead, she dashes forward freely in the darkness.

attributes.content: The phantoms have disappeared, and the memories recede like the tide.
She finds herself standing in the middle of a long path.
At the end of the path is a door. The door divides life and death, and whether it leads from life to death or from death to life, it opens only to the King of Victoria.
We're here.
attributes.name: Siege
